Supposing you have a function from the Booleans to the Booleans:
\begin{tcAthena}
declare f: [Bool] -> Bool
\end{tcAthena}
prove the following conjecture:
\begin{tcAthena}
define conjecture := (forall b . f b = b ==> f f b = b)
\end{tcAthena}
